alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jackson, northeastern Walton, Holmes and northern Washington Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 215 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Marianna to 9 miles north of De Funiak Springs. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chipley, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Marianna, Graceville, Chattahoochee, Bradford, Union, Sneads, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Ponce De Leon, Alford, Caryville, Westville, Bascom, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo and Gritney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; Washington
